actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Census and Population.
Committee on Post Office and Civil Service discharged.
Mr. Sawyer asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Designating the week beginning July 21, 1991, as the "Korean War Veterans Remembrance Week".

summary.text: Designates the week beginning July 21, 1991, as Korean War Veterans Remembrance Week. Requires the President to urge that the American flag be flown at half staff on July 27, 1991, in honor of those Americans who died as a result of their service in Korea.

titles.title: Designating the week beginning July 21, 1991, as the "Korean War Veterans Remembrance Week".
